name: Emberhearth
description:
Emberhearth is an arcade-style dungeon crawler where the single goals is to collect gems, fight evil creatures and survive!

The game is all about getting from start to finish. There is no continues or checkpoints! Upon defeating the end boss or dying, your gathered score will be revealed!

Inspired by Nintendo Entertainment System's gameplay and arcarde vibe, made me make this short game in 4 days!
Enjoy!
